content:
This is a test document for verifying Tika server functionality.

The Tika server should be able to extract this text content and provide metadata about the document.

Key features to test:
- Text extraction from various formats
- Metadata extraction (file size, word count, etc.)
- Document processing pipeline integration
- Neo4j vector storage

This document contains multiple paragraphs and should demonstrate that the document processing pipeline is working correctly after fixing the Tika server startup issue.
